pr_title: Allows job parameters to be logged only as system message or not at all

timeline.message:
Allows job parameters to be logged only as system message or not at all

Altough parameters can be restricted by permission within the collectParameters method, once they are logged they can be seen by everyone who has access to these logs. As this could expose sensitive data, parameters can now restrict their logging behaviour.

Fixes: OX-6144
